did.unittitle: Report of the activities of the Division of Works covering pre-Exposition period ending Feb. 20, 1915 / by A.H. Markwart. -- 1 bound typescript.
Illustrations for above - photographs with typed list of contents. Bound.
Blue prints, graphs, & tables with typed list of plates.
Appendix - specifications & contracts. Typed with printed provisions, statements, forms, etc. Bound
